title: Dominic Monaghan & Billy Boyd Try To Stump Stephen With LOTR Trivia | Colbert Classic
description:
Dominic Monaghan, Billy Boyd, and special guest Peter Jackson tried to find a "Lord of the Rings" trivia question that would stump our host. And to up the stakes, they have a special LOTR prize for Stephen if he can get it right.
